snippet: Carlotta Brett-Pierce was convicted in the death of Marchella Pierce, who weighed 18.8 pounds and was bruised and scarred when her body was found in September 2010.
abstract: Carlotta Brett-Pierce is convicted of murder in the 2010 death of her 4-year-old daughter Marchella Pierce.
lead_paragraph: Carlotta Brett-Pierce was convicted in the death of Marchella Pierce, who weighed 18.8 pounds and was bruised and scarred when her body was found in September 2010.

headline.seo: In Marchella Pierce Death, Mother Is Convicted of Murder
headline.main: Mother Guilty of Murder in Death of 4-Year-Old
headline.print_headline: Mother Guilty of Murder In Death of 4-Year-Old
